text: Sir Manuel Amadeo Esquivel, KCMG, PC (2 May 1940 - 10 February 2022) is a Belizean politician. He was the leader of the United Democratic Party from 1983 to 30 August 1998. As Leader of the United Democratic Party, Esquivel was Prime Minister of Belize first from 17 December 1984 to 7 September 1989, and then again from 3 July 1993 to 30 August 1998.EMBRACING History: Dr. Manuel Esquivel AmbergrisCaye.com. (accessed 9 October 2014) He died on 10 February 2022, aged 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Belize
title: Manuel Esquivel
